revolver 0.3.0
  • Reference

Plot the clonality status of cohort driver events.

plot_drivers_clonality.Rd

Driver events can be annotated in clonal or subclonal clusters. This function reports this information in a barplot.

plot_drivers_clonality(x)

Arguments

x

A REVOLVER cohort.

Value

A ggplot object of the plot.

See also

Other Plotting functions: plot_CCF_histogram, plot_DET_index, plot_drivers_occurrence, plot_graph_drivers, plot_patient_data, plot_patient_mutation_burden, plot_patient_oncoprint

Examples

# Data released in the 'evoverse.datasets'
data('TRACERx_NEJM_2017_REVOLVER', package = 'evoverse.datasets')

plot_drivers_clonality(TRACERx_NEJM_2017_REVOLVER)

  • Value
